title: SET_MINIMAP_SONAR_SWEEP
content:
0x6B50FC8749632EC1// SetMinimapSonarSweep
void SET_MINIMAP_SONAR_SWEEP(BOOL toggle);Parameters:toggle: A boolean value where true activates the sonar sweep animation on the minimap, and false turns it off.Returns: This native does not return any value.Enables or disables the sonar sweep animation on the minimap.NativeDB Introduced: v2189Old name:  _SET_MINIMAP_SONAR_ENABLED
